fs.polyglot.view
Class GroupEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      fs.gui.FrameworkDialog
                          fs.polyglot.view.GroupEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceDependent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GroupEditor
extends FrameworkDialog
implements ResourceDependent

An editor for a group change. The old group path is indicated at the top and the new group path is given by the user. Furthermore the user can specify if string ids bearing the old group path as prefix should be renamed and if subgroups should be moved as well. An invalid entry is detected, if a group is supposed to be moved to a subgroup and subgroups are affected as well.
Potential DataRetrievalListeners are notified with the new path as data and can retrieve the other values via getter methods.

Author:
Simon Hampe
See Also:
Serialized Form

GroupEditor

public GroupEditor(java.lang.String path,
                   java.lang.String newpath,
                   ResourceReference r,
                   PolyglotStringLoader l,
                   java.lang.String lid)
Constructs a group editor

Parameters:
path - The path of the original group to be changed
newpath - The path of the new group (if null, nothing will be inserted)
r - Never used
l - The string loader for label texts and similar
lid - The language id for label texts and similar

performUndoableGroupEdit

public UndoableGroupEdit performUndoableGroupEdit(UndoableEditFactory f)
                                           throws javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException
Performs the group edit associated to the data in this editor. This method should only be called by a dataRetrievalListener, when dataReady is called, since this ensures validity of the operation

Throws:
javax.swing.undo.CannotRedoException
